title: Intraday Market Rebalancing
description: A wind farm's generation is coming in lower than the day-ahead forecast. The trader must rebalance the position in the intraday market to avoid penalties.

tasks.description: Get the latest real-time generation data and the updated short-term forecast for the wind farm.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms a 10 MW shortfall for the next 2 hours.

tasks.description: Check the intraday market prices to determine the cost of buying power to cover the shortfall.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent retrieves the current bid-ask spread for the relevant market product.

tasks.description: Execute a buy order on the intraday market to cover the 10 MW shortfall for the next two hours.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully purchases the required energy.
